title: Mediterranean Market and Bakery
typeOfFood: Buffet, Mediterranean, Take-out, Bakery, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Downtown cafe and market offering more vegan choices than the other eateries around here. Its deli case offers healthier prepared foods for to-go or to eat-in. Could ask for a vegetable platter of the various individual items, like gazpacho, lentil soup,3-bean salad, quinoa salad, butter-bean salad, black-eyed pea salad, roasted cauliflower and basil, tabouli, green-bean salad, baba ghanoush, hummus, and falafel. The bean salads use olive oil and lemon juice for dressing and are vegan suitable. Also could order falafel wrap (vegan suitable).
